site.title: AlgoRhythmics
site.tagline: OS-native AI studio for calm, explainable products
site.description: AlgoRhythmics fuses signage-born craft with cloud-native automation to launch NodeVoyage, Ideonautix, and consulting pilots across AAA-accessible interfaces.

hero.tagline: We choreograph Aurora Purple shells and AAA-accessible tokens across NodeVoyage, Ideonautix, and advisory pilots.
hero.subtitle: Light, dark, and high-contrast palettes shift the entire canvas — frosted glass, grain, and gradients included.
hero.description: Backed by signage R&D and Google Cloud, we blend dynamic minimalism with explainable automation so teams explore confidently, even when motion is reduced.
pillars: Aurora Purple threads through three WCAG AAA-compliant palettes tuned for light, dark, and high-contrast audiences.
Motion plays once: hero reveals and OS flourishes respect reduced preferences while keeping context readable.
Signage discipline meets cloud delivery so every assistant ships explainable, auditable, and production ready.

nodevoyage.copy: Adaptive itineraries, offline-first rituals, and a transparent AI guide built for explorers.

ideonautix.copy: Modular founder copilots orchestrating metrics, decks, and ambient automation in one calm workspace.

focus.title: One operating system for every surface
focus.description: From travel storytelling to founder analytics, we reuse the same palettes, timing, and accessibility guarantees.
points: Desktop-OS shells, mobile rituals, and consulting dashboards inherit identical spacing and focus cues.
Reduced-motion paths keep icons, outlines, and labels visible even when animations pause.
Explainable automation pairs signage-grade hardware tests with cloud telemetry to prove reliability.

hero.brand_aria: AlgoRhythmics brand highlight in the hero heading

story.title: Our story
story.reality_text: We build OS-native experiences where travel companions, founder copilots, and advisory pilots feel cohesive from the first tap.
story.mission_text: Deliver accessible, explainable AI systems that help regulated teams adopt automation without losing human oversight.
story.vision_text: A calm Aurora design language blending frosted glass, grain textures, and focused motion across every AlgoRhythmics surface.

founders.title: Meet the Founders
founders.subtitle: Two makers connecting signage R&D with human-first AI

nikita.name: Nikita Jurtaevs
nikita.bio: Nikita Jurtaevs co-leads AlgoRhythmics as CEO, shaping brand storylines and guiding product direction for NodeVoyage and Ideonautix. He pairs studio building with Reclame Fabriek’s signage lab, translating tactile experimentation into launch-ready digital experiences.
nikita.current_position: Reclame Fabriek — steering LED neon, controller, coating, and 3D fabrication programs that inform our product standards.

slaff.name: Vjaceslavs "Slaff" Trosins
slaff.bio: Vjaceslavs “Slaff” Trosins co-leads as CTO, architecting the cloud stack, data flows, and AI integrations behind NodeVoyage and Ideonautix. His signage-controller engineering inside Reclame Fabriek’s innovation unit keeps our delivery resilient and explainable.
slaff.position: Reclame Fabriek — evolving controller hardware, LED systems, and production tooling that feed real-world requirements into our software.
slaff.philosophy: Systems thinking across hardware and software keeps our decisions pragmatic; we validate ideas on the shop floor and translate the best of them into human-first digital products.
achievements: Runs a Google Cloud–first platform stack with SvelteKit, Flutter, Fastify, Prisma/PostgreSQL, and realtime messaging.
Aligns signage-grade controllers and LED pipelines with accessible, explainable AI user journeys.
Leads funding sprints that underwrite NodeVoyage and Ideonautix while recruiting multi-disciplinary talent.
slaff.brand_intro: Worked with global brands on premium advertising display systems:
slaff.brand_context: Projects delivered through Reclame Fabriek (Daugavpils, LV), shared by both founders
slaff.algorhythmics_vision: Fuse signage discipline with cloud delivery so AlgoRhythmics ships trustworthy, installation-ready AI experiences.

products.meta_description: Compare NodeVoyage and Ideonautix, our flagship OS-native platforms, and launch their demos on nodevoyage.algorhythmics.dev and ideonautix.algorhythmics.dev.
products.title: Two flagship platforms, one shared OS
products.subtitle: NodeVoyage and Ideonautix run on the same AAA design system tuned for light, dark, and high-contrast themes.
products.description: We apply Aurora Purple, Voyage Blue, and Signal Yellow across every theme so your team knows what to expect whether exploring a travel itinerary, orchestrating a founder sprint, or joining a consulting pilot.
products.grid_title: Platform pairing built for explainable outcomes
products.grid_description: Each flagship inherits frosted glass panels, grain textures, and OS-native behaviors so travel planners, founders, and partners collaborate without relearning the interface.

knowledgeBase.answer: AlgoRhythmics blends signage discipline with cloud-native automation. We ship flagship products while mentoring partners so they inherit our AAA design system and explainable AI practices.
NodeVoyage is our OS-native travel companion. It builds adaptive itineraries, honours offline needs, and keeps suggestions transparent through the Nodi AI guide.
Ideonautix is a constellation of founder copilots. It orchestrates pitch rehearsal, revenue analytics, and automation rituals so teams focus on high-value thinking.
Our consulting pilots pair signage-honed rigor with cloud automation. We co-design explainable workflows, stress-test compliance, and leave your team with an enduring playbook.
Start with a discovery sprint: we map goals, audit data flows, and prototype a focused assist. Then we co-create experimentation loops so the improvements continue after launch.
